title: Essential Moon Knight, Vol. 3
description: Night falls, the Moon Knight rises, and neither sorcery, science, nor mortal sin can win against him Battles with Bushman and Morpheus, the Fly and the Raptor, plus it's hero vs. hero, the moon against the darkness, when the Fist of Khonshu battles the Hand of Darkness: The Shroud Tales from not one, not two, but THREE monthly series, plus more Guest-starring the Fantastic Four, the X-Men, Spider-Man, and Dr. Strange.Collecting: Moon Knight 31-38, 1-6; Marvel Fanfare 30, 38-39; Solo Avengers 3, Marvel Super-Heroes 1, Marc Spector: Moon Knight 1-2
author: Doug Moench
